action.text: Manuel Lito Manceli assigned to Jona Felizardo

full_threads.body: @manuel, please update the below just on the page https://acoufelt.com/us/product/table-solutions/ <https://acoufelt.com/us/product/table-solutions/>

Heath,

I would like to add the following information to the table solutions product pages – under the ‘Details’ section.

Make your space your own with Acoufelt’s range of table solutions. Designed to reduce ambient noise and visual distractions, U and L shaped freestanding dividers are lightweight, easy to assemble and compatible with a range of work surfaces. Plus – they’re made from a minimum of 60% recycled content. Our table solutions are currently available in color ‘Platinum’.

Specification table:

Composition
100% Polyester
Color
Platinum
Material
FilaSorb™
Recycled Content
60% min.
NRC Rating
0.45
Thickness
0.47” +/- 10% |12mm +/- 10%
Dimensions
U-Shape: 16" x 36" x 18"
L-Shape: 16" x 36" x 18"
Fire Tests
AS ISO 9705: 2003 Group 1, ASTM E84-17a Class A, ISO 9705: 1993 Group 1

Perhaps put ‘shipping’ details in table below this data? Or else in the ‘Details’ section below the other info?

Please ensure Minimum Acoustic NRC Rating says 0.45. Am working to get L-shape and additional renders across shortly.

FYI – will we eventually be separating the U and L shape product pages? Just think this might be better for clarity – but open to hear your thoughts.

Thanks!


Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310
Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000
acoufelt.com <http://www.acoufelt.com/>
